column3: Investigating boost.asio sounds like a good idea, before we build it entirely from scratch.\n
Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/5cb618146cedc7630513afb016ef386e6bd4f172 for binaries and test log.\n
Looks like a lot of code for a feature that should be standard. I assume it will be easier using boost::asio?\n

Most likely we can use boost.asio deadline_timer...  but that requires moving the "io_service" from RPC into the core code, so that non-RPC code may take advantage of the async I/O engine (and the timers that lie within).\n

closing, self-meh.

should consider boost deadline timer, rather than creating threads for same.
